类型: Size: 9 Wide Women/8 Wide MenColor: Dark Grey
评论详情: Perfectly true to size, incredibly light and comfortable before any wearing in, surprisingly cute, look small for large shoes, very well made, excellent and simple shipping materials (wish it was all paper instead of the plastic bags, though). I bought them for indoor-only shoes, but they're sturdy enough I'll be buying more for outdoor use. I like them better than the Whitin and Xero shoes, which aren't as cute, and don't fit my foot as proportionally well. They are affordable enough that I can recommend them to my patients who need zero drop shoes w/ a wider toe box. I will say that their soles aren't nearly as thin or flexible as I'm used to, so I'll have to see if I end up heel-striking out of habit in them. I'm still 100% happy with my purchase.

I got these for general foot care, with a wide toe box and very flat.  What I wasn’t expecting was how good they are for weights.  I find the tread grippy, the shoe is snug and secure with no rolling, and perfect feedback when pressing or doing kettlebell work.

类型: Size: 10.5 Wide Women/9.5 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: I'd prefer if they were a quarter inch wider, but that part isn't the deal breaker. Blisters, on my pinky toes, are the deal breaker.  My feet are 10.5in from heal to toe, and 4.3in wide. Ordered men's 9.5 because 8.5 and 9 are NEVER wide enough. Shoe length was acceptable, not too long.  Wore these indoors for 5 hours around the house to test. Quality is poor to middling. Material is very thin, which is great for barefoot style shoes, but I don't think they will last. I appreciate the flatness, zero arch, and zero drop.  Size is too narrow because of poor stitch design which rubs against the pinky toes, even in the wide toe box. It would be acceptable if not for feeling like sandpaper was abrading my toe. It's only the toe box which is "wide," so the rest of the shoe is more narrow; but honestly, it felt fine and snug, but not *too* tight.  I'd probably keep these, since they were cheap, if not for the poor stitching placement and quality that is giving me a blister on my pinky toe after just 5 hours of lounging around the house.  I do have some 'moleskin' padding, to stick over that stitching area, that I may try tomorrow before returning the shoes.

评论概述: Improved my squats and dead lifts!
评论详情: I love these for weight lifting, not so much for getting around. I removed the inner sole and they definitely feel like walking barefoot, but protected somewhat. The grip on the bottom is terrific. Recommended when on sale!

类型: Size: 9 Wide Women/8 Wide MenColor: White
评论详情: I received a size smaller than I ordered, but thats good, cus they fit fine. I actually thought they were too big at first because I'd never had all that toe box space before. Just as flexible as advertised. Thin soft insole. It's not all white, parts are more of a cream color. I was dumb and tried to wear it all day working in a school, not a good idea noon, barefoot noob, but I like them in grassy spaces or indoors and they're nice on the playground.

类型: Size: 14 Wide Women/13 Wide MenColor: Dark Grey
评论详情: I've always had foot problems.  I have reeeeally wide feet and even the widest of shoes are too narrow and I inevitably blow out the sides after a couple months of uncomfortable use.  Been the story of my life for 42 years.  Finally decided to give this whole minimalist shoe thing a whirl this spring (while mostly going barefoot or wearing minimalist sandals) and my feet have never felt better.  I work on my feet all day long and hike a lot and walk my dog anywhere from 3 - 10 miles a day and if I am wearing shoes, these are the ones I am wearing and I love them.  I have admittedly already worn them out however but given how inexpensive they are, I'm not mad about buying a new pair soon.  I definitely recommend them to everyone I know.

类型: Size: 11.5 Wide Women/10.5 Wide MenColor: White
评论详情: You can pay $100+ for Xero shoes that tear and rip within a year, or you can buy these, which feel exactly the same, for a fraction of the price AND they hold up. I hike in these all the time and have only had to rinse and lightly scrub them and let them dry in the sun. Still look brand new. I never write reviews but this is one of those rare products that is inexpensive, but not “cheap.”

类型: Size: 9 Wide Women/8 Wide MenColor: White
评论详情: I bought these before going on a 3 week trip to Europe, a bit of gamble, but holy cow it paid off!! We walked for miles and miles everyday, going to museums and palaces, walking along the sandy and clay-ish beaches in England, running with my 20 lb backpack to catch our ferry, walking along the Seine, exploring the grounds of Pena Palace in Portugal, I have barely worn any of my other shoes since we got back from the trip. All the walking and running around we did in all sorts of terrain and environments and these shoes held up splendidly! Walking around in them all day never hurt my feet! There is plenty of room for all of your toes which makes walking so pleasant, and I swear even my balance is better since I am able to use my whole foot and the sole is thin enough that you can get a sense of what the ground is like beneath your foot which helps (but the sole is also thick enough that it's not going to hurt if you step on a rock or something). They have surprisingly good traction! They are canvas so their water resistance is basically zero, but they also dry pretty quickly if they get wet. I had expected them to look cartoonish because they are so wide, but they are actually very cute and I cannot say enough how much I LOVE THESE SHOES!

It's very difficult to find a shoe that will fit and live up to the promises. This shoe does that. Feels like I'm walking barefoot! However, I confess to having  removed the inside sole padding, which slipped right out with no effort. It's perfect in the tip of the shoes --- no cramped toes! For the price it's just about perfect!

类型: Size: 9 Wide Women/8 Wide MenColor: Dark Grey
评论详情: These truly are like going barefoot, only your feet are protected. I wish they had other colors besides gray, tan and white because I would buy them in every color.  They may not be the most beautiful shoes, but they are the most comfortable. The wide toes mean lots of room. I got them to work out in because I can't wear shoes with arch supports after my foot surgery. Now I wear them everywhere. The price was great. They're really lightweight.  Highly recommend!

评论概述: They are what they say they are
评论详情: They work as they should. They’re shoes with a flat sole. Wide so no pushing the toes together. They grip nicely so no slipping even on a mildly wet kitchen floor. They do look kind of funny at first, since we’re all used to seeing pointy shoes that are terrible for foot health, but you kind of get used to that pretty quick and then they just look normal.  Perfect for light walking or for wearing indoors. They’re comfortable and thick enough for that.  That said, if you’re not someone used to running barefoot definitely don’t run outside on pavement with these. I made that mistake chasing a dog and my bones hurt. :)  If you’ve got Achilles tendinitis I also would not recommend these for extended periods of time. If just for indoors where you’d otherwise would be barefoot then these are ok for that too since there is a little less strain on the tendon than with being fully barefoot. Otherwise best to look for shoes with a higher heel.

类型: Size: 13.5 Wide Women/12.5 Wide MenColor: Apricot
评论详情: I purchased these for my son who prefers wide toe box  and  thin sole. He absolutely loves them. I went ahead and purchased all the colors they had, it is great price. We’ll see how long they last.

These shoes surprised me with how well they are made and for only $20. I’ve worn them daily for a few months now. The wide toe box and zero drop is better than other similar shoes. They are lightweight and the rubber sole is thin, durable, and has excellent grip. I’m only giving 4 stars because of the color options and the memory foam insoles. The insoles, imo, are terrible. They give me a “floating” feeling that throws off my balance. Also, the material used for the top of the insoles has no grip and feels slippery to my feet. I’m not sure why others haven’t mentioned this. Taking them out alleviates that, but the footbed under the insole is not meant to be used without an insole. Wearing them like that for just a couple days builds up lent balls that are uncomfortable and feel like little pieces of gravel stuck inside your shoes. I haven’t yet been able to find insoles that fit these shoes and suit my fancy. So other than the terrible insoles and color options, these are an excellent affordable option of barefoot shoes.

评论详情: I normally take a size 10, but I went with the guidelines on the page as far as shoe size. And that came out to size 9.5. Which I ordered, They fit perfectly.  First impressions are they are well made and seem to be worth more than the price, so I am very happy with them.  People complain that there is no padding or support, I don't think are familiar with these types of shoes. It's like John Travolta said in the movie "Phenomenon". "You got to learn to sit in the chair." You got to learn to walk in these shoes. If it hurts to walk, your body is telling you that you must adjust your stride so you can prevent getting injured.  I have a pair of Vivobarefoot and wanted the court 3 which go for an astronomical amount compared to these, so I am pretty happy.  Would recommend but measure first. You know what they say, Size matters.

评论概述: Best shoe for an amazing price
评论详情: These barefoot shoes are amazing. I for one had never heard of these kind of shoes until my brother mentioned them to me while we were talking about my many other shoes and our families messed up feet that were susceptible to ingrown toenails. At first I was very skeptical about them but for the price I figured they were worth the shot. These shoes are great.  FIT: These shoes fit my extra wide feet perfectly. The actual shoe size is spot on and the wide toe box is no joke. There is ample room for my toes with absolutely zero toe scrunching. Also the low cut tops are great for not digging into my swollen ankles and lower legs.  COMFORT: These barefoot shoes are super comfortable. They feel like walking around barefooted but your feet are still protected. They are very breathable so that your feet don't sweat and the soles are super grippy making me feel secure on all surfaces .  CONSTRUCTION: All of the materials that these shoes are made from seems to be very durable. I have been wearing these shoes every day with no issues. The stitching has held up just fine with no frays or torn stitches. The fabric is super durable with no holes or tears and there has been no sole separation.  All in all these shoes are great. I have bought another pair for myself and my mom even got a pair to wear to work and she loves them. I would highly recommend these barefoot shoes to anyone.

类型: Size: 10.5 Wide Women/9.5 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: To start with very comfortable, good fitting and very light weight great for exercise and general use. The material pretty good quality and after a while of use hadn’t shown any sign of wear that I can see. One thing to note is that for some of you who are prone to hyperhidrosis may need to consider how your body reacts to no socks barefoot shoes and materials in these, as you don’t want to end up walking around in soggy shoes. But its pretty breathable and so for heat shouldn’t be problem and might be a good thing due to lighter material used. Also, the sole provides enough protection agains pebbles and uneven surfaces, while giving you the “barefoot” shoe experience without looking like Ape feet. As long as you don’t plan on a hiking trip in these for some reason I’d say they more then adequate for what your getting them for, light, breathable, nimble, travel, “barefoot” shoes, etc.

评论概述: I Can Confidently Navigate Surfaces Without Worrying About Slipping, Here Are My Notes…
类型: Size: 11 Wide Women/10 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: This item has been with me for a very short time.  I ordered the ZVC Barefoot Wide Toe Box Shoes Knitted Zero Drop Sole Sneakers because I was looking for a comfortable and versatile pair of shoes to wear in my everyday activities. This particular model caught my attention due to its wide toe box design, which allows for natural foot splay and prevents any discomfort or restriction. Furthermore, the zero drop sole provides a great level of stability and supports proper posture while walking or running. The knitted upper material is extremely breathable and lightweight, enhancing breathability and reducing sweat during extended periods of wear. These shoes also offer excellent grip so I can confidently navigate various surfaces without worrying about slipping.  I hope you find this review helpful.

类型: Size: 8 Wide Women/7 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: They feel just like wearing slippers! I broke a toe and ever since cannot wear shoes that are narrow near the toes. The toe box is wide allowing freedom of movement even if you have toe problems. Not only is there room side to side but the fabric the top of the shoe is made from has elasticity to it, allowing for room top to bottom while not feeling loose or shifting while you walk. The shoe is a zero drop variety meaning there is no heel elevation like in many shoes. This is a healthy thing for feet but can take getting used to if you wear heels often. There is no arch support. The sole is soft and comfortable but thin. When walking over rocks, you can feel the uneven surface. I wear these at work and they are perfect for that but I have a mix of sitting and standing. I think you would need something with more support and padding if you had to stand or walk in these for 8 hrs. The black color goes well with all the pants I wear to work. These would also be perfect as dedicated house shoes.

评论概述: Comfy shoes for light daily use, nice simple style, laces a bit short
类型: Size: 12.5 Wide Women/11.5 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: Overall, I'm quite happy with these shoes.  I mainly just wanted something simple and comfy for basic use.  Not looking to wear them on all-day outings or big hikes, just little day to day basic tasks.  For that, they work well.  The soles are decent but fairly light and don't provide a ton of cushion, so I don't think they would provide great all-day comfort.  I tend to keep my shoes laced a bit loose since I like them to be comfortable and these laces are a bit too short for that, so I skip the last hole to still be able to easily tie them.  Style is nice and simple - some reviews have mentioned a bit of a "clown shoes" look and the toe area does flare out slightly more than usual, but I don't notice it once I'm actually wearing them.  The materials feels good and solid, so I expect decent durability.  Overall, if you just want so basic simple comfy shoes and don't need a lot of support, these are a nice option.

类型: Size: 9.5 Wide Women/8.5 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: These minimalist shoes have a good shape and most importantly a wide toe box for the toes to spread. I love the simple design and how versatile the black looks. It goes well with a lot of my clothes.  The biggest drawback is the sole. While some may enjoy the flexiblity, I felt like it was too soft, coming off as cheaply made. I have tried other minimalist shoes, but I found that these were not comfortable after long walks. I enjoy wearing Toms Alpargata, so flat shoes don't bother me. I run about 40 miles weekly, and would not recommnend running in these. I think they are good for lifts, like squat, when you don't want a heel drop; or casual shoes for short errands.  I have thought whether my feet need to be strengthen a little before wearing these shoes, but I don't think that is the case. Recommend for those who want simple shoes for quick casual wear, and not big investment into minimalist shoes with wide toe box.

. Well made a so very comfortable.  Perfect for around the yard, gardening, greeting the Amazon delivery person, and to run out to the mailbox.  Comfortable - they are "barefoot" shoes. Not for long walks on concrete or trips to the grocery store. VERY NICE for around the yard. Almost like "aquatic" shoes but not stretchy.  The sole appears rugged and has a gripping surface. It flexes well. The stitching and construction is flawless.  Wide width and in my big size ! It's hard to find shoes that are a good value for us big foot guys. These are great no matter your size. Nice they are wide width.  These shoes are a great value for such good quality.

评论概述: Great Look, Unexpected Comfort - Buy Now :)
类型: Size: 11.5 Wide Women/10.5 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: I've been toying with several shoes that have this wide-toe-box and added these to the list to try out, and I must say the look is different but it's not as drastically different as some others I own. The comfort is there too - I've probably worn them for a total of 24 hours now, 6 or 7 hours as a time, and they're great! They fit well, stay put and are decent to walk and run in - i would go jogging in them for exercise, but if you need to chase down a basketball or 5 yr old or something like that they're not uncomfortable or hazardous to sprint in. All in all I am pleased, especially given the price point.They looks good, feel great and will look even better with some glow in the dark  (or reflective) laces!

类型: Size: 12.5 Wide Women/11.5 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: I have never owned a pair of "barefoot" shoes and wanted to give them a try.  When they arrived (in a clear plastic bag), the first thing that struck me was the overall shape. The toe end flares out sharply giving it (as other reviewers have also pointed out), a slight clown shoe vibe. It's subtle, but definitely noticeable. This design allows for plenty of toe-wiggling room and I have found them to be comfortable for around the house and in my studio.  They are minimalistic in style so there is little to comment on there. They fit true to size and you should consider them to be "wide" when selecting what size will work best for you.  The other main thing that I noticed right away is the lack of arch support and cushion. This became apparent when I went for my morning walk of about two miles. By the time I was half the distance, my feet were starting to feel sore. I'm not sure if this is the specific shoe or if this is part of what makes it a "barefoot" shoe, but I quickly concluded that these shoes were not made for walking (at least not on pavement). So, I'll continue to wear them around the house and in my home studio because they are comfortable in those situations.

类型: Size: 9.5 Wide Women/8.5 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: ZVC Barefoot Shoes are great. They provide ample width for people with wide feet and/or especially for people who don’t want their toes smashed into a point. The shoes are minimalistic - that’s true - but when you know exactly what your getting, it really helps appreciate the product, especially at that price.

评论概述: Really nice lightweight shoes that do not crush your toes
评论详情: I am someone who works out regularly and have several pieces of cardio equipment that I use daily. The main two are my exercise bike and treadmill. I like to use them for a long period of time and often my feet starts to ache after a bit, and my toes get really crushed in my sneakers. So, when it came across these, I thought they sounded really interesting and like they would be a good fit for me, so I went ahead and placed an order for them. When they arrived, I was really eager to use them right away. I was first struck with how lightweight they are. They look like they would be heavier than they actually are. The construction seems pretty well. I don’t know if these would be really well to run in or to put a lot of wear on because where the soles meet the fabric it seems like it could’ve been better constructed, but since I’m using it for my indoor equipment, I think it will be perfect for me. One odd thing was that I ordered them in size 14, and inside the install was a sticker that said 14 but when I peeled it away, it actually was printed 13 on the insole . But, they definitely fit like a size 14, so even though it was a little confusing, they did accurately fit. They do look a little bit funny. The way they are shaped looks almost like an orthopedic shoe to me, but, these are so comfy when using them! The toe part is shaped like your foot is so it gives total freedom and are extremely comfortable, especially for prolonged periods of time. The material is very breathable and super comfy all around. I definitely recommend giving them a try, and even though they may not be the most visibly pleasing, your feet will definitely thank you! They’re also at a great price point and definitely worth it. I hope my review helps you to make a more well informed decision.

类型: Size: 11.5 Wide Women/10.5 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: I like to wear something on my feet all the time, slippers in the house, boots, sneakers or dress shoes to go out.  Thought these might work like sneakers, not not really sure.They are minimalist.  It has a thin rubber like sole, with a mesh like covering over the top.  There is no arch, no padding.  When I put them on they remind me of water shoes, with laces.  If you are someone who hikes with bare feet, these would give your feet some protection from sticks and sharp rocks.  I could also see them very useful if you backpack and want a pair of comfortable shoes to wear around the campsite after taking off your hiking boots.They appear to be well made.  I wear a 10 or 10.5, and these are the right size at 10.5.  The toe area is very roomy.  Tread looks adequate, should give enough grip for most surfaces.  They should serve me well.

类型: Size: 11.5 Wide Women/10.5 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: Can't complain with this shoe as it fits well and is comfortable to wear. It's simple and works well with almost all outfits. Recommend.

评论概述: Comfortable! Great toe box! Somehow makes your feet look smaller!
类型: Size: 9.5 Wide Women/8.5 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: I've been wearing these steadily since they arrived. There was a slight adjustment of a few hours because I had supports in the previous sneakers whereas these are trying to let your feet assume their natural position. I wasn't trying to be funny when I said they make your feet look smaller. It's weird but they really do. They are nicely made. I've even gotten away with wearing them with dress plants.

评论概述: ZVC Barefoot Shoes Men Wide Toe Box,  Black, size  6.5 men 7.5 for women, very comfy, light weight.
类型: Size: 7.5 Wide Women/6.5 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: I've been wearing nothing but these shoes since they arrived. At first I was concerned that they looked too small. There was a temporary size tag covering the printed size.  I tried them on, laced the laces and they fit well.  There is some arch in the shoes but the wide toe box, is really cool.  I live it!  I was wearing another pair of more trendy looking shoes and my toes were numb, falling asleep and tingly.  I put these on, and wore them all day. My toes are happy.  They look cool on as well. With jeans and skinny style pants, they are really fun looking.  I'm happy with the order and hope that my foot health is improved. I am not very familiar with barefoot shoes, and all the reasons for the benefits of the body and fitness. I am not sure what makes these shoes 'barefoot' shoes. But, my toes and thanking me.5 stars
